name: Javierbarrera.GitHub.io
body:
# SharePoint Team Lead | Architect

## Hi and Welcome! 
I'm a Product Windows Engineer at [Rackspace Hosting](http://rackspace.com). My primary focus is the Microsoft enterprise application stack running at Rackspace dedicated services, [Microsoft Azure](https://azure.microsoft.com/), and [Amazon Web Services (AWS)](https://aws.amazon.com/). I have delivered over 30 presentations at SharePoint focused events, authored numerous blogs, articles and books. 
I live in Dallas, TX with my beautiful wife Roxane, and three children. 

## Authored Book
### Microsoft SharePoint 2013 Administration Inside Out
[Amazon Book Link](http://a.co/fn5URlv)
[Amazon Author Link](http://amazon.com/author/javierbarrera)
Book Summary: Dive into SharePoint 2013 administration—and really put your systems expertise to work! This supremely organized reference packs hundreds of timesaving solutions, troubleshooting tips, and workarounds. Discover how the experts deploy, configure, and manage SharePoint—and challenge yourself to new levels of mastery.
![Microsoft SharePoint 2013 Administration Inside Out](https://github.com/book.jpg)

## Other books I've helped on... 
* [Professional SharePoint 2013 Administration](http://a.co/67XQ9g5)
* [Beginning SharePoint 2013: Building Business Solutions](http://a.co/fkR4Q3d)
* [Microsoft SharePoint 2013 Inside Out](http://a.co/aY3GtOj)

## Javier Barrera
[My LinkedIn Profile](www.linkedin.com/in/javierbarrera)
[My Twitter Profile](https://twitter.com/jtbarrera)
My Blog: [Tech Growing Pains](http://techgrowingpains.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
